document.full_text: almost 18,000 model helicopters sold in the united states and canada have been voluntarily recalled for potential impact and laceration hazards, governments of the two countries said on tuesday.
document.title: recalled model helicopters pose laceration risks
lines_and_colors: almost 18,000 model helicopters sold in the united states and canada have been voluntarily recalled for potential impact and laceration hazards, governments of the two countries said on tuesday.
